description: This is a Dart source file for a Flutter application that includes webview components to load and display local HTML assets. It defines classes for routing, webview pages, and a homepage to select various HTML screens, as well as logic for loading, injecting base href, handling errors, and logging WebView interactions.

classes.name: HtmlScreenRoute
classes.description: Represents a route configuration for displaying an HTML screen, including a title and asset path.

classes.name: HtmlAssetWebViewPage
classes.description: A stateful widget that displays an HTML asset in a WebView with loading and error handling.

classes.name: _HtmlAssetWebViewPageState
classes.description: State management for HtmlAssetWebViewPage, handling WebView setup, asset loading with base href injection, timeouts, and error logging.

classes.name: HtmlScreensHomePage
classes.description: A stateless widget providing a list of routes to various HTML screens for in-app navigation.

methods.name: _injectBaseHref
methods.description: Injects a <base href> tag into the HTML string to ensure relative URLs resolve correctly.

methods.name: _loadHtml
methods.description: Loads the HTML asset into the WebView, injecting the base href, setting up load timeout, and error handling.
